title: How to write a personal bio for a fundrasier - Quora

response.answer_text: It's quite simple. Just sit down, take out a blank sheet of paper, ponder or reflect, and brainstorm all the reasons you need to have that instrument for college, particularly how it would contribute to your learning pursuit or what benefits you can derive to help you succeed in college. Use an idea map or cluster diagram or web graphic organiser if you are familiar with it. Then, narrow down the top 3-5 reasons/benefits you have listed to craft out a short and concise description as your sales pitch, so to speak. Think of the potential donors as you write for, as it has to be uniquely interesting and heart-warming for them to call for action. Godspeed!
